name: El Ministerio del Tiempo VR: Salva el tiempo
name_original: El Ministerio del Tiempo VR: Salva el tiempo
description:
"Save the Time" is a virtual reality experience in which you'll be inside one of the best television series in Spain," The Ministry of Time ". In this experience, you​'ll​ live an adventure in first person​,​ try​ing​ to dismantle the plans of the "Angel Exterminator"​ sect​ ​as they tr​y to change the history of Spain and to destroy the Ministry. ​During these 15 minutes, you will face several challenges against time that you will have to solve with ability and cold blood.

The mission will begin in the Archives of the Ministry​ room​, where the director of the Ministry of Time, Salvador Marti, will ​reach out to you​, ​request​ing​ your help. "The Exterminating Angel" has placed a bomb in the doors of the passage of time​ in an attempt to trap in the past one of ​the best agents, Lola Mendieta.

But the trap is more elaborate than ​even ​the Savior himself thought, and both ​of you are trapped. You will have to demonstrate your ​investigative​ and logic abilities​ to escape of the room of the Archives and reach the aisle of the doors. There, with the help of Irene Larra, you will have to cross the gates of time ​to search in the past​ for​ new clues​ about the sect's hiding plac​e.

"Save the Time" is the second virtual experience of the Ministry of Time, ​a ​continuation of "Time in Your Hands", also available on Steam, in which you became an agent of the ministry, after passing an examination with the help of the ​series ​different characters​.​
